description: Number of non-degenerate fanout-free Boolean functions of n variables having AND rank 2.
references: J. P. Hayes, Enumeration of fanout-free Boolean functions, J. ACM, 23 (1976), 700-709.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Index entries for sequences related to Boolean functions
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
